comments.content: If I remember correctly,  'host-update --status' is a Xen only thing. You can use service-enable/service-disable instead.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: Then we should disable this command for other hypervisors, when operator run the command, we should throw out not implement error
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jay-lau-513

comments.content: We might actually throw a not implemented error here -- what happens when you use the latest novaclient (i.e. one where this https://review.openstack.org/#/c/87809/ is included)?  Also, what version of OpenStack, etc are you using?
